metadata.description: Dynamic tab structure for UCO Land Property Details template

sections.description: Land type, restrictions and acquisition details

tabs.description: Basic property information and location details
Site conditions, amenities, and infrastructure details
Valuer mandate and property assessment details

sections.description: Land area calculations and market rates

tabs.description: Detailed valuation components and final calculations

fields.placeholder: Name of the owner(s) and his/their address (es) with Phone no. (details of share of each owner in case of joint ownership)
e.g. Google location is attached with the report

fields.uiDisplayName: Whether Covered Under Any Land Ceiling of State/Central Govt.
fields.placeholder: Provide details whether Covered Under Any Land Ceiling of State/Central Govt.
Like a famous buildings, famous house, some landmark area etc.

fields.uiDisplayName: Any restriction Regards to Use of Land
fields.placeholder: Provide details whether any restriction Regards to Use of Land
e.g. NA or Its not an agricultural land
e.g. Rs. 450.00 lac as mentioned in sale deed

fields.uiDisplayName: Occupied by Owner/Tenant and How Long

fields.placeholder: e.g. All amenities available in a radius of 1.0 to 2.0 Km
e.g. Plain or Rocky or Hilly etc.
e.g. Plain or Rocky or Hilly etc.

fields.uiDisplayName: Type of Use to Which it can be Put
Whether the Plot is Under Town Planning
fields.placeholder: e.g. Already planned and developed by the HSVP/HUDA

fields.uiDisplayName: Whether the Plot is Intermittent or Corner
Whether any Road Facility is Available?

fields.placeholder: e.g. B. T. Road or Cement Road etc.
e.g. By the HSVP or Borewell etc.

fields.uiDisplayName: Sale Instances of the Property in the Locality

fields.placeholder: e.g. North facing property located in well developed sector of HUDA/HSVP
Three storeyed house constructed on a plot of 300sqm with covered area 4695.87sft

fields.uiDisplayName: Area of the land /Extent of land to be considered for valuation
In case of building, built up area.
fields.placeholder: About 4695.87sft as per valuation report of Ace Architects valuers dt. 17.11.2023

fields.uiDisplayName: In case of building under construction, status/progress of construction and approximate time required for completion
Distance of the site from the branch
Fair description and proper location of the assets, which are the subject of valuation, giving clearly identification, comments with reference to legal rights and restriction in ownership, if any
fields.placeholder: The Legal Counsel On The Panel Of UCO Bank may be consulted in this regard.
H No. 651, Sec 8, Urban Estate, Panchkula, Hr. 134109

fields.uiDisplayName: Name of the present owner of the property

fields.placeholder: H No. 651, Sec 8, Urban Estate, Panchkula, Hr. 134109

fields.uiDisplayName: Occupation of the owner( if other than the applicant)
No. of stories and age of the building
Whether the property has been purchased by the present owner or inherited or received as a gift.(The Valuer should verify seller's photo-ID and address)
fields.placeholder: The property has been purchased by the owner

fields.uiDisplayName: Consideration/reason for offering the property as mortgage(in case of third party property) in case of third party collateral security.
fields.placeholder: Three storeyed building on a plot of 300sqm offered for collateral security for availing loan

fields.uiDisplayName: Whether the property is free from tenancy? The valuer should make inquires with people residing in the property .He should also note the nature of tenancy (Commercial or Residential) and period of occupation. He should apply suitable reduction in the value.
fields.placeholder: The property is free from tenancy and occupied by the client herself

fields.uiDisplayName: Who is occupying the property at present
Condition of the land/land & building from the point view of sale.
Whether local enquiry made to satisfy about history of the property.
The Valuer in his report should mention the name/s of the persons present at the time of inspection or the person identifying the property.
fields.placeholder: Owner was present during site visit and her photograph taken with family at the gate of house

fields.uiDisplayName: Comments on the locality (Posh/Middle class/ Lower middle class)
Connection of the locality with main city
Type of construction of the building(With posh amenities like marble flooring and costly fittings/ordinary fittings and equipment's)
fields.placeholder: Enter construction type and amenities details

fields.uiDisplayName: No. of Floors and Height of Each Floor Including Basement

fields.placeholder: Total covered area on all three floors = 4695.87sft

fixedColumns.columnName: Estimated Replacement Rate per Sq.ft. (in Rs.)
